summary: Utility module that centralizes handling of Megatron-LM resources for NeMo NLP components, including configuration lookup, checkpoint retrieval, tokenizer and vocabulary access, cache management, and model parallel rank calculation.
business_intent: Streamline integration of Megatron pretrained models into NeMo pipelines by providing reliable access to model files, configurations, and related assets, reducing setup complexity for developers building large-scale language models.
